forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers this morning with overcast skies during the afternoon hours. High 57F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High near 65F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.
